commit message: optimized imports
bug fix be vary of the default locale ...
We do not need to include backups stored in external into cloud backups

make Save and New command available for split transactions
fix minor inconsistencies:
# update account in split part list after user changes account
# make invert command also for Transfer templates
optimized imports and maybe prevented nullpointercaused by getDialog returning null in rare occasions (report 8ae2e4d051c47e2d6c92d80f65449edf and a8837f83b00e65dc0c2b48ce4e698a4e)
prototype of simplified UI for creating new plans: User selects recurrence and start date, and we (will) take care of the rest
refactoring that allows us to postpone storing of new plan until we save the template, and thus simplifies flow of execution for ExpenseEdit
Next major simplification step: We now default to the local calendar, no longer show calendar setup dialog
set RRULE based on selected recurrence
watch out for changes to plan, minor cleanups
apply usage limit again
labels for recurrence spinner
extracted missing label from AOSP calendar app

optimized imports,
allDay leads to crash on Gingerbread: dtend and duration cannot both be null for an event
respect constraint defined in API doc: If allDay is set to 1 eventTimezone must be TIMEZONE_UTC and the time must correspond to a midnight boundary.
fix layout displayed incorrectly on Gingerbread
customizing calendar considered advanced
fixed state handling of date and plan buttons
refactored CrStatusAdapter into separate class
factored out adapter for operation type spinner
minor UI glitches (spinner alignment)
encapsulated isDirty for better debugging
adapted to new signature
test release, lint checks
removed legacy code and resources
added missing method
fixed some resources
removed obsolete
synced with Transifex

upgrade support library to fix https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=201836
and get ready for release
release do it
fragment transaction is less risky in onPostResume, and take care of setting mPlanUpdateNeeded back to false
If we do not reset the recurrence spinner, we will create a plan, that we will try to save, and run into SecurityException, and user getting stuck without being able to save template
encapsulate Plan feature availability
no longer used
incremented version code to be in sync with Play Release
